name: RadixWeb
tag_list: custom-software-development, web-application-development, offshore, outsourcing, software-company, custom-programming, web-designing, portal-developments, web-development, mobile-application, programming, multimedia, design, web2-0, websites, web-develope
overview:
Offers custom software development and web application development services.

Radix is an Offshore Outsourcing software company from India haveing office at California. Radix Web is a full service oriented software solution firm and total solutions provider for Internet. Located in India. We offer custom programming using client server architecture, internet & intranet development include web designing , portal developments, web & mobile related programming, multimedia design, web2.0 websites etc.

We have well experienced professionals in many web platforms such as flash designs , flash action scripts , DNN Skinning, PHP, ASP.Net, Ruby on Rails , HTML , photoshop, web designs , java scripts, , MY SQL, MS SQL etc.
